str2: All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From pistis; to have faith, i.e. Credit; by implication, to entrust.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
All, the whole, altogether. Absolutely all or every one.
Probably from sun; common, i.e. shared by all or several, or profane.
